Simon McMenemy Diganti, Ini Tanggapan Asisten Pelatih Timnas Indonesia
06 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Joko Susilo angkat bicara soal adanya pergantian pelatih Timnas Indonesia. Asisten Pelatih Timnas Indonesia ini menyebut perubahan tersebut merupakan hal yang wajar dalam dunia sepak bola.
"Ini merupakan suatu hal yang wajar dalam dunia sepak bola," ucap Joko Susilo, pada Bola.net.
"Ini merupakan kebijakan dari federasi. Jadi saya rasa, kami semua harus siap dengan semua kemungkinan yang ada," sambungnya.
Sebelumnya, Komite Eksekutif PSSI memutuskan untuk mengganti pelatih Tim Nasional Indonesia, Simon McMenemy. Pelatih asal Skotlandia ini digeser karena dinilai gagal membawa Timnas Indonesia meraih hasil positif dalam Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022.
PSSI sendiri bakal segera mencari pelatih untuk mengisi posisi yang ditinggalkan McMenemy. Pelatih anyar ini dijadwalkan bakal menangani Skuad Garuda, julukan Timnas Indonesia, usai laga kontra Timnas Malaysia, Rabu (19/11/2019) mendatang.
Ada sejumlah nama yang saat ini ditimang-timang sebagai pengganti McMenemy. Selain mantan Pelatih Timnas Indonesia, Luis Milla, ada juga sosok pelatih asal Korea Selatan, Shin Tae Yong.

Simon McMenemy Replaced, This is the Response of the Indonesian National Team Assistant Coach
Nov 6 2019, 15:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Joko Susilo spoke about the change of the Indonesian national team coach. The assistant coach of the Indonesian national team said the change was a natural thing in the world of football.
"This is a natural thing in the world of football," Joko Susilo said on Bola.net.
"This is the policy of the federation. So I think we must all be prepared with all the possibilities," he continued.
Previously, the PSSI Executive Committee decided to replace the coach of the Indonesian National Team, Simon McMenemy. The Scottish coach was shifted because it was considered a failure to bring the Indonesian national team to achieve positive results in the 2022 World Cup Qualifiers.
PSSI itself will soon be looking for a coach to fill the position left by McMenemy. This brand-new coach is scheduled to handle the Garuda Squad, the nickname of the Indonesian national team, after the match against the Malaysian national team, Wednesday (11/19/2019) future.
There are a number of names that are currently being hobbled in place of McMenemy. In addition to the former Indonesian national team coach, Luis Milla, there is also the figure of a South Korean coach, Shin Tae Yong.
